name: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+
overview: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX+ is an arcade video game based on the Wangan Midnight manga. It is the second upgrade of the Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3 arcade series, the first being Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX. It's also the last Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune installment to be released in the United States.
